author: stefanbratanov
content: Hi, For Teku, it doesn't unregister validators if you sent empty list via that api. Essentially nothing will happen in that case. But in general Teku beacon node keeps track of registered validators and expire them if they haven't been updated in a while (like 3 epochs).  Updating happens via the endpoint (VC sends validator registrations every epoch) or via internal call when VC and BN is in one process (again every epoch).
